content: very shelley bookmark very shelley bookmark the pa ern and photographs in this pa ern are the property of labours of love crochet and should only be used for personal and non-commercial use you may not alter or sell this pa ern in any way you may sell finished products made from this pa ern but please credit labours of love crochet when referring to the pa ern thank you ©labours of love crochet - 2021 page 1 very shelley bookmark abbreviations us terms st s&tch materials chain - chain 3 25mm hook double_crochet double_crochet needle & scissors shell 5dc in same st 5g of 4ply yarn repeat repeat bulon or bead to decorate skip skip fo finish off pattern notes ➢ palern repeat is a mul&liple of 6 + 1 in the star&ng chain ➢ finished length of 8 shells is 25cm ➢ first ch3 counts as a s&tch chart laboursoflovecrochet bookmark using a 3 25mm hook chain 45 in 3rd chain from the hook 4dc this counts as first st skip 2 single_crochet skip 2 shell repeat x 6 shell in the same st as last shell then working down the other side of the chain skip 2 single_crochet skip 2 shell repeat x 6 slip_stitch into first st ch10 to form tail fo with bulon bead or tassel ©labours of love crochet - 2021 page 2 very shelley bookmark thanks for choosing to support my designs i really appreciate it and i look forward to bringing you more designs in the future if you have any ques&ons please contact me ruth on laboursoflovecrochet@gmail com or @laboursoflovecrochet on instagram and i d be happy to help ruth x i would love to see your versions if you post on instagram please use the tag #veryshelleybookmark and tag me @laboursoflovecrochet so i can see them ©labours of love crochet - 2021 page 3 @laboursoflovecrchet
